text: Leucheria is a genus of flowering plants in the aster family.Lagasca y Segura, Mariano. 1811. Amenidades Naturales de las Españas 1(1): 32 Leucheria is native to South America and the Falkland Islands.Crisci, Jorge Victor. 1976. Revisión del género Leucheria (Compositae: Mutisieae). Darwiniana vol 20, No. 1/2, pages 9-126 in Spanish ; Species ==References== Category:Mutisieae Category:Asteraceae genera Category:Flora of South America Category:Taxa named by Mariano Lagasca
title: Leucheria
